text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer I’m concerned about the #coronavirus #CoronavirusOutbreak proliferation among the #Homeless. Will they be rounded up like prisoners & plague carriers or treated w #Respect and kept together as #families? They will scatter throughout the country spreading virus if rudely treated.
